title: How I Started in Freelancing
summary: From translating and proofreading in Hebrew to earning $1000 per month working a few hours, my experience can guide you to kickstart your freelance journey.

title: Freelancing Tips for Beginners
summary: Learn key strategies to stand out and get clients faster in the competitive world of freelancing.

title: Top 5 Mistakes New Freelancers Make
summary: Avoid common pitfalls like undercharging, overcommitting, and poor client communication to grow your freelance career faster.

title: How to Build a Freelance Portfolio With No Clients (Yet)
summary: Tips on curating your best work, presenting it professionally, and attracting higher-paying clients.

title: How to Get Your First Freelance Client on Upwork
summary: A beginner's guide to landing your first Upwork client quickly through profile optimization, strategic bidding, and excellent delivery.

title: Finding Your Freelance Niche
summary: Discover how to focus on your strengths and specialize to stand out in a crowded market.

title: Setting Rates as a Freelancer
summary: Learn how to price your services fairly, increase rates over time, and communicate value to clients effectively.

title: Freelancing Tools I Use Every Day
summary: A guide to software, apps, and resources that make freelancing easier and more efficient.

title: How to Handle Difficult Clients
summary: Practical advice for maintaining professionalism, setting boundaries, and ensuring smooth project delivery.

title: Scaling Your Freelance Business
summary: Tips on growing your income, automating tasks, and turning freelancing into a sustainable career.

title: The Freelancer's Lull: What To Do (and What NOT To Do) When Work Dries Up
summary: Strategies and tips for managing frustration and anxiety during project lulls without abandoning your long-term freelance strategy.
